original_text:
Have the gates of death been revealed to you,
    or have you seen the gates of deep darkness?
korean_text: 사망의 문이 네게 나타났느냐 사망의 그늘진 문을 네가 보았느냐

sentences.original_text: Have the gates of death been revealed to you
or have you seen the gates of deep darkness?
sentences.korean_translation: 혹은 네가 깊은 어둠의 문을 보았느냐
